external_references.description: Pany, D. & Hanley, C. (2023, May 3). Cloudy with a Chance of Bad Logs: Cloud Platform Log Configurations to Consider in Investigations. Retrieved October 16, 2023.

objects.description: Monitor for many failed authentication attempts across various accounts that may result from password guessing attempts.(Citation: Mandiant Cloudy Logs 2023) Analytic 1 - Multiple failed logon attempts across different accounts. (index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode IN (4625, 5379)) OR (index=os sourcetype="linux_secure" message="Failed password") OR (index=os sourcetype="macos_secure" message="Failed to authenticate user")
